title: State of Generative AI in the Enterprise 2024
description: Explore findings from the Deloitte AI Institute's report tracking generative AI trends, business impacts, and challenges throughout 2024.

title: Change Management for Artificial Intelligence Adoption
description: A detailed change management approach to  help organizations navigate the increased adoption of AI capabilities.

title: People are worried that AI will take everyone’s jobs. We’ve been here before.
description: In a 1938 article, MIT’s president argued that technical progress didn’t mean fewer jobs. He’s still right.

title: Culture Reimagined: How Pharmaceutical Firms Can Use Data and AI with Confidence
description: This report explains what leading companies are doing differently, finds out what is stopping other firms from emulating them and offers advice on how to break down those barriers.

title: Synthetic Imagery Sets new Bar in AI training efficiency
description: MIT CSAIL researchers innovate with synthetic imagery to train AI, paving the way for more efficient and bias-reduced machine learning.

title: Wall Street Embraces AI despite risks of Catastrophe
description: The use of AI is being adopted in many financial institutions amid concerns, from every aspect including legal, fraud, cybersecurity, trading, loans, claims, and even email management

title: How AI Will Impact the Next Generation Workforce
description: AI is transforming the workforce by promoting inclusivity and accessibility with technology, bridging the skills gap through equity, and removing biases during the hiring process.

title: How AI Can Help Humans Become More Human
description: This article addresses how AI can assist people in developing habits and improving their mental and physical health through digital coaching. By studying individuals' preferences, AI can cater work plans to people.

title: AI: What is the Future of Artificial Intelligence
embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/LK5j3pp0Too?si=SaKfMTAYz-ia9iFK" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
description: This interview covers how AI can be used to advance aspects of engineering, healthcare, and society as a whole. Embracing and harnessing AI is key to shaping the future, though challenges when it comes to integration are unavoidable.

title: The AI revolution: Google's developers on the future of artificial intelligence | 60 Minutes
embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/880TBXMuzmk?si=q2OPkjtTW8-xOsip" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
description: Competitive pressure among tech giants is propelling society into the future of artificial intelligence, ready or not. Scott Pelley dives into the world of AI with Google CEO Sundar Pichai.

title: Andrew Ng: Opportunities in AI - 2023
embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5p248yoa3oE?si=6sFeXbZ7qa5y52Jr" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
description: This talk covers: Trends in AI Technologies and Tools, Supervised Learning, Generative AI, The Adoption of AI Opportunities in AI Process for Building Startups and AI Risks and Social Impact
